::Battera/ KitKat/DarkMouse::

Battera::

she walked down the hallway of the Cybertron Fire and looked about.  
She passed the messhall and went further down to the hallway.  She 
found herself in the doorway of the bridge. "Hello?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

KitKat::
"Terrorsaur, any luck yet?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

DarkMouse::
She looked again at her monitor.
"Commander Scorponok, the bot who was flying towards our base has 
veired off and is now headed to the Allience base. This is a good 
thing, I hope."
She sighed and sat down in her chair at the console.  She didn't even 
look at Scorponok.  She just stared at the monitor and watched the 
diods blink on and off.
